0f15921a-2743-4105-8738-3cbb9ed8751d.name: Vacuum Satefy Mode Change Request
0f15921a-2743-4105-8738-3cbb9ed8751d.script:
const api_url = "http://thermoc:8081/api/vacuum_mode/set/"
const request = require('request')

mode = {
 "Idle": 1,
 "High Vacuum": 2,
 "Primary Vacuum": 3,
 "UNSAFE Mode": 4,
 "Stop": 5,
 "Glow Discharge": 6
} 

// fetch data
const data = context.arg.source.data[0]


let url = api_url + mode[data.goto]
request(url)


context.projectManager.send("info.main", "Vacuum Satefy Mode goes to " + data.goto)
